attributes.action: Provide short term funding to prevent food price increases due to the flood crisis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are warned that damage to agricultural land, infrastructure and food stocks, by the current flooding will increase food prices. This will not only affect those people who have lost their homes but vulnerable members of our whole nation. It is imperative that some provision is made to prevent those on a low income from losing the ability to maintain good nutritional standards.
